languages.text: "Смогут ли мон-кай почерпнуть из трагедии мудрость и встать на новый путь? Порой потрясения — это не конец, а повод к обновлению".

traits.locale_text: "Смогут ли мон-кай почерпнуть из трагедии мудрость и встать на новый путь? Порой потрясения — это не конец, а повод к обновлению".

languages.text: "Can the mon-keigh draw wisdom from tragedy and follow a new path? Sometimes, calamity is not the end, but the impetus for renewal."
languages.original_text: "Смогут ли мон-кай почерпнуть из трагедии мудрость и встать на новый путь? Порой потрясения — это не конец, а повод к обновлению".

traits.locale_text: "Can the mon-keigh draw wisdom from tragedy and follow a new path? Sometimes, calamity is not the end, but the impetus for renewal."
"Can the mon-keigh draw wisdom from tragedy and follow a new path? Sometimes, calamity is not the end, but the impetus for renewal."
"Can the mon-keigh draw wisdom from tragedy and follow a new path? Sometimes, calamity is not the end, but the impetus for renewal."
"Can the mon-keigh draw wisdom from tragedy and follow a new path? Sometimes, calamity is not the end, but the impetus for renewal."
"Can the mon-keigh draw wisdom from tragedy and follow a new path? Sometimes, calamity is not the end, but the impetus for renewal."
"Can the mon-keigh draw wisdom from tragedy and follow a new path? Sometimes, calamity is not the end, but the impetus for renewal."

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイどもは、悲劇から知恵を学び、新たな道を歩むことができるのだろうか？時として災厄は終わりではなく、再生への契機となる」
languages.original_text: "Can the mon-keigh draw wisdom from tragedy and follow a new path? Sometimes, calamity is not the end, but the impetus for renewal."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイどもは、悲劇から知恵を学び、新たな道を歩むことができるのだろうか？時として災厄は終わりではなく、再生への契機となる」

languages.text: "Können die Chem-Pan-Sey aus einer Tragödie lernen und einen neuen Weg einschlagen? Manchmal ist eine Katastrophe nicht das Ende, sondern der Impuls für Erneuerung."
languages.original_text: "Can the mon-keigh draw wisdom from tragedy and follow a new path? Sometimes, calamity is not the end, but the impetus for renewal."

traits.locale_text: "Können die Chem-Pan-Sey aus einer Tragödie lernen und einen neuen Weg einschlagen? Manchmal ist eine Katastrophe nicht das Ende, sondern der Impuls für Erneuerung."

languages.text: « Les mon-keigh sont-ils capables de tirer une leçon de cette tragédie pour s'engager sur une autre voie ? Parfois, la calamité n'est pas une fin, mais l'impulsion qui entraîne le renouveau. »
languages.original_text: "Can the mon-keigh draw wisdom from tragedy and follow a new path? Sometimes, calamity is not the end, but the impetus for renewal."

traits.locale_text: « Les mon-keigh sont-ils capables de tirer une leçon de cette tragédie pour s'engager sur une autre voie ? Parfois, la calamité n'est pas une fin, mais l'impulsion qui entraîne le renouveau. »

languages.text: «¿Pueden los mon-keigh aprender de la tragedia y seguir un nuevo camino? A veces una calamidad no supone el final, sino el ímpetu para la renovación».
languages.original_text: "Can the mon-keigh draw wisdom from tragedy and follow a new path? Sometimes, calamity is not the end, but the impetus for renewal."

traits.locale_text: «¿Pueden los mon-keigh aprender de la tragedia y seguir un nuevo camino? A veces una calamidad no supone el final, sino el ímpetu para la renovación».

languages.text: “猴子会从这场悲剧中汲取智慧，踏上新的道路吗？有的时候，灾难并不是一切的终点，反而会带来新生。”
languages.original_text: "Can the mon-keigh draw wisdom from tragedy and follow a new path? Sometimes, calamity is not the end, but the impetus for renewal."

traits.locale_text: “猴子会从这场悲剧中汲取智慧，踏上新的道路吗？有的时候，灾难并不是一切的终点，反而会带来新生。”

languages.text: "Mon-keighler, trajediden ders çıkarıp yeni bir yol çizebilecek mi? Bazen felaketler sonu değil, değişimi getiren itici güçtür."
languages.original_text: "Can the mon-keigh draw wisdom from tragedy and follow a new path? Sometimes, calamity is not the end, but the impetus for renewal."

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keighler, trajediden ders çıkarıp yeni bir yol çizebilecek mi? Bazen felaketler sonu değil, değişimi getiren itici güçtür."

languages.original_text: "Can the mon-keigh draw wisdom from tragedy and follow a new path? Sometimes, calamity is not the end, but the impetus for renewal."
